Html:
I am in the part within the StoreController where I am not modifying the index, browse, and details methods now that the EF for SQL CE is in place and when I run the project, it goes fine until I try to go to "localhost~/Store/". Then it gives me an "arguementexception was unhandled by user code" issue at this code point:

            var genres = storeDB.Genres.ToList();
            return View(genres);
I have also updated the class as such:
public class StoreController : Controller
{
    MusicStoreEntities storeDB = new MusicStoreEntities();

It highlights in yellow all the references to "storeDB", but again, not sure why this is doing this and am hoping some of you can help here? Is much appreciated!

I bit more, within the browser address bar, I do see that when I try to go to anything with "localhost~/Store" that it will say "Format of the initialization string does not conform to specifications starting at index 0". Not sure what that means, but is probably something simple I am overlooking. Ideas or fixes please? Thanks much!
